test translated 
r7 += 15   // r7 = 15    00000 1 0111 0111 00 0000000000001111
r12 += 16  // r12 = 16   00000 1 1100 1100 00 0000000000010000
r4 = r1 + r12 // r4 = 16 00000 0 0100 0001 11 0000000000000000 
r12 += r4  // r12 = 32   00000 0 1100 1100 01 0000000000000000
r4 = r12 - 17 // r4 = 15 00001 1 0100 1100 00 0000000000010001
r1 -= 100 // r1 = -100   00001 1 0001 0001 00 0000000001100100
r1 += 20 // r1 = -80     00000 1 0001 0001 00 0000000000010100
cmp r1 r12 // eq=F,gt=F  00101 0 0000 0001 11 0000000000000000
r9 += -80 // r9 = -80    00000 1 1001 1001 00 1111111110110000
cmp r1 r9 //Eq=T,gt=F    00101 0 0000 0001 10 0100000000000000
r11 = r9 -r12 //r11=-112 00001 0 1011 1001 11 0000000000000000 
cmp r9 r11  //eq=F,gt=T  00101 0 0000 1001 10 1100000000000000
r6 += -99 addu//r6=65437 00000 1 0110 0110 10 1111111110011101
r3 += 63addh//r3=4128768 00000 1 0011 0011 11 0000000000111111
cmp r6 65437 //eq=T,gt=F 00101 0 0000 0110 01 1111111110011101
r5 = r6 + r3//r5=4194205 00000 0 0101 0110 00 1100000000000000 
cmp r5 r6//eq=F,gt=T     00101 0 0000 0101 01 1000000000000000
r0+= 0//                 00000 0 0000 0000 00 0000000000000000
cmp r6,r5//eq=F,gt=F     00101 0 0000 0110 01 0100000000000000
